website_summaries.verdict: Backyard Stuff is the perfect expansion if you already enjoy sending your Sims to play outside in "The Sims 4," even if this is little more than a collection of cool patio-side home objects.
pros: Adds over 40 new home objects to give your backyard a summertime makeover
Includes wind chimes, exciting lawn water slides, garden decor, bird feeders, and more
cons: Not for Sims fans who prefer to keep their Sims indoors

customer_reviews.title: Waterslide!
customer_reviews.text: This has a few cute items for your yard, but I mostly bought it for the waterslide activity & it does not disappoint! My sims had so much fun & despite a couple of face plants at first, they were able to do some fancy slides pretty quickly. It also seems to build fitness skill, so I'm going to try it with my kids this summer to see if it counts as "physical activity" for their scouting badges.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie582

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Tell Me I'd All Ready Purchased
customer_reviews.text: I hate that I couldn't cancel my purchase. I accidentally purchased this before for my sister's Christmas gift and rebought it again today for her because it was on sale. LITERALLY seconds after I realized my mistake I went to cancel the purchase and could not. So, now I have a $10 game pack I don't need and can't return.
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a Stuff Pack!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I don't usually buy Sims 4 Stuff Packs, but this was definitely a good purchase! The bang for your buck with various interactive objects (e.g. iced tea/lemonade pitcher, wind chimes, personal water slides) is definitely worth it, especially for the Summertime "chill out" vibe that Seasons brought to the game. If that's the kind of extra content you want for your Sim's backyard, then I think you'll enjoy this one.
customer_reviews.author: SSD

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, I love it
customer_reviews.text: Huge sims fan, one of the few people who love sims 4 more than sims 3 and I must say I enjoyed this pack. I mostly use the water slide and a few clothing items. It's a wonderful pack and I was really hoping to see those seasonal related items come back to the game. It's a wonderful and fun gift for your committed sims 4 fan!
customer_reviews.author: Lerecia

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a little more....
customer_reviews.text: There weren't nearly as many new items as I'd hoped. The ones that are included are a lot of fun though, and it's helped me transform my Sims' homes!
customer_reviews.author: AmarilloSun

customer_reviews.title: Desiring more.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Sims, but I hate the idea that some of these stuff packs aren't living up to it's full potential. Just like Patio stuff pack, this pack is leaving us wanting more! But it does add some awesome features to the game.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Love

customer_reviews.title: personally i liked enough of the items in this stuff pack to ...
customer_reviews.text: it's a stuff pack. i'd look online for video reviews of the contents to see if it is worth the price to you. personally i liked enough of the items in this stuff pack to feel it worth getting, but the prices of the stuff packs while not on sale still seems kind of a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids are Sims finatics.. All the backyard stuff you can think of for your Sims.
customer_reviews.author: DianeD

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! My sims have fun sliding on the water slide- and it is hilarious! So glad I ordered this one. :D
customer_reviews.author: Data

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: This adds a fun element to the game. Its a great stuff pack with a lot of new interactive items like the water slide, the wind chimes and the bird feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Scott

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up to the creators!
customer_reviews.text: I really don't use the outdoor stuff they gave you. Because I normally live in apartments and you can't put them in there.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Shae

customer_reviews.title: Thank you again, Amazon & Origin.
customer_reviews.text: AGAIN, ANOTHER GREAT STUFF PACK FOR MY SIMS FAMILY HOUSES. THANK YOU AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Sonya Blade

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter begged me to get her this and she loves it! Brings out her creativity
customer_reviews.author: Espressomom

customer_reviews.title: but I still enjoy it every day
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a long time lover of the sims. I purchased this quite a while back, but I still enjoy it every day! Very happy with the game!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Fun but minimal.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the new water slides available in the game, but it's very minimal for the price. It would be nice if more interactive things were included with the game packs.
customer_reviews.author: Amber J.

customer_reviews.title: Great "Stuff"!
customer_reviews.text: Always nice to have new stuff in your game, it's even nicer when it's on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Elessar

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff pack
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff pack. I actually play with this stuff back a lot, throwing backyard summer parties for my Sims. This was definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moore

customer_reviews.title: One of the best stuff packs!
customer_reviews.text: This pack is great because it has a great balance of hairstyles, clothes, and furniture. Overall, this pack is actually worth the $10.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: I love this it was difficult to redeem but I got the code the next day I’d say it’s worth the money😇🤪😚😋😛😜

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the waterslides! Great way to liven up the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle Hardenstine

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt give you too much
customer_reviews.text: It is cool for a slip n slide but it's not soo much fun

customer_reviews.title: Code disappeared
customer_reviews.text: Can’t find the code ended up buying it again on Orgin

customer_reviews.title: So fun and very entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This game was all it was hyped up to be. So fun and very entertaining

customer_reviews.title: Summer Fun
customer_reviews.text: One of the better Sims4 Stuff packs. Really adds a summer time feel to the atmosphere of the game.

customer_reviews.title: better off purchasing the disc
customer_reviews.text: Could never able to get it to work...better off purchasing the disc!

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my daughter, she has had no ...
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my daughter, she has had no complaints and the ease of using the game code makes it so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: LatiaMont

customer_reviews.title: Backyard Stuff a double hit for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun pack, you can see by the waterslide. I gave this away in a contest, so I had double the fun with it. I gave it away, as I had already purchased one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: jimmysnan

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got the code immediately after purchase and downloaded easily!!!!!! Going to buy a few more games packs soon enough. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kate Ro

customer_reviews.title: Cool but you can download free stuff that's better online
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it should include way more stuff for the price.
customer_reviews.author: India Peacelove

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but I wish I could get more ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it,but I wish I could get more stuff on it.

customer_reviews.title: Team Sims..Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to add to my Origin and works just as well as the ones I uploaded off EA.

product_meta.title: The Sims 4 - Backyard Stuff [Online Game Code]
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC Online Game Code| Edition:Backyard Stuff

Create a casual backyard space for your Sims to kick back and cool off with The Sims 4 Backyard Stuff*. Attempt crazy tricks on the lawn water slide or chill out with a glass of lemonade. Decorate the backyard with colorful new objects and outfit your Sims in laid-back fashion.
PC Minimum System Requirements:PC Recommended System Requirements: * Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon 64 Dual-Core 4000+ or equivalent (For computers using built-in
 * RAM: 2 GB RAM
 * Hard Disk: At least 3 GB of free space (14 GB if installing with The Sims 4) with at least 1 GB additional spac
 * Video Card: 128 MB of Video RAM and support for Pixel Shader 3.0. Supported Video Cards: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or better, ATI Radeon X1300 or better, Intel GMA X4500 or better
 * Supported OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7

 * Processor: Intel core i5 or faster, AMD Athlon X4
 * RAM: 4 GB RAM
 * Hard Disk: 15 GB of Hard Drive space
 * Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 650 or better
feature_bullets: Requires The Sims 4 Game (Sold Separately) And All Game Updates To Play

Slip, Slide, and Splash – Your Sims can cool off and let loose on two all-new lawn water slides. Perform and perfect a variety of tricks for your audience including surf-sliding through the jaws of a shark! Add soap for an even wilder experience.

Personalize the Backyard – Brighten up your Sim’s outdoor space with vibrant potted plants, playful decorative lights, and multi-colored patio furniture. Finish off the look with a soothing wind chime or add a bird feeder that’s sure to attract a few feathered friends.
Lounge in New Fashion – Dress your Sims in comfortable clothing and relaxed hairstyles that are perfect for hanging out in the backyard or sipping a glass of iced tea.
*REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY
